fr.upmc.colins.farm3.cpu

Class CpuControlRequestArrivalInboundPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort
            • fr.upmc.colins.farm3.cpu.CpuControlRequestArrivalInboundPort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlRequestArrivalI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.TwoWayI, fr.upmc.components.ports.InboundPortI, fr.upmc.components.ports.PortI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class CpuControlRequestArrivalInboundPort
extends fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort
implements ControlRequestArrivalI
    The class CpuControlRequestArrivalInboundPort implements the inbound port for a cpu receiving control request from other components.

    Description

    The port implements the ControlRequestArrivalI interface as offered and upon a call, passes it to the owner component that must also implement the method updateClockSpeed.

    Created on : 23 nov. 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Colins-Alasca
    See Also:
